summary:
Mixed methods UX researcher with 7+ years of experience, bringing customer insights to drive impact on both 0-1 and mature products. 
Also a psychologist, anthropologist, data nerd, foodie, and wanderlust. 
Get to know more about Bo: https://uxrbo.com/
If you are looking for a mentoring chat: https://adplist.org/mentors/bo-liu?session=17709-career-coaching

‚Ä¢ Collaborated daily with cross-functioning stakeholders, such as product, design, copy, data science, marketing, etc., in a fast-paced environment.
